quote: When the fish is caught we pay no more attention to the trap. – Huang Po
fact: Alfred Hitchcock didn`t have a belly button. It was eliminated when he was sewn up after surgery.
joke: Every night at 11:11, I make a wish that someone will come fix my broken clock.
